text: Jiaru yi wei funu haipa ta de zhangfu hui nuedai ta huo paoqi ta, name, jiaru ta lia zhi jian neng dacheng hejie, dui ta lia shi wu zui de, hejie shi zui hao de [zhu]. Ren de benxing shi tanlan zhipei de. Jiaru nimen xingshan bing jingwei [yuanli xie'e], name, fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la que shi che zhi de.
